text:
#WWHL host Andy Cohen and the #RHONY mom will go into detail about her separation in an exclusive interview.

Create a free profile to get unlimited access to exclusive videos, sweepstakes, and more!

Luann de Lesseps will sit down with Andy Cohen to discuss her split from Tom D'Agostino at her home in Sag Harbor on Wednesday, September 6 at 11/10c. The special, Watch What Happens Live One-on-One with Luann de Lesseps, will mark her first interview of this nature since announcing her divorce earlier this month. Check out a preview of the interview, above.

The Real Housewives of New York City mom will get candid about the red flags she ignored, the rumors surrounding Tom's loyalty to the Big Apple pal and what finally led to the separation.

Andy and Luann will sit down and discuss her split from Tom in an interview debuting on September 6.

Luann will discuss her divorce with the WWHL host from her home in the Hamptons.

And don't forget to tune in this Wednesday, August 30, at 8/9c to check out Part 3 of the RHONY Season 9 reunion. Preview below.
